verses.text: \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w time|strong="G5154"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G2532"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. “\w Every|strong="G3956"\w* \w matter|strong="G4487"\w* must \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w established|strong="G2476"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w testimony|strong="G4750"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*.”

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w already|strong="G4258"\w* warned \w you|strong="G1437"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w time|strong="G1208"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G1437"\w*. \w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* absence \w I|strong="G2532"\w* write \w to|strong="G1519"\w* warn \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w sinned|strong="G4258"\w* earlier \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w else|strong="G3062"\w*: \w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* return, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w spare|strong="G5339"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3956"\w*,

\w since|strong="G1893"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w demanding|strong="G2212"\w* \w proof|strong="G1382"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*. \w He|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* weak \w in|strong="G1722"\w* dealing \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w but|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* powerful \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w although|strong="G5210"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* weakness, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w lives|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w power|strong="G1411"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* weak \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Him|strong="G2532"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w Him|strong="G2532"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w Examine|strong="G1381"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w see|strong="G1381"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*; \w test|strong="G3985"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*. \w Do|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* realize \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*—\w unless|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* actually \w fail|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w test|strong="G3985"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w hope|strong="G1679"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w realize|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w failed|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w test|strong="G1097"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w pray|strong="G2172"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w anything|strong="G3367"\w* \w wrong|strong="G2556"\w*—\w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w appear|strong="G5316"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w stood|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* test, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w right|strong="G2570"\w*, \w even|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G5613"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w appear|strong="G5316"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w failed|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G1063"\w* \w cannot|strong="G1410"\w* \w do|strong="G1410"\w* \w anything|strong="G5100"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G2596"\w* truth, \w but|strong="G1063"\w* \w only|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2596"\w* truth.

\w In|strong="G2532"\w* \w fact|strong="G3778"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* weak \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w strong|strong="G1415"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* prayer \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w perfection|strong="G2676"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w why|strong="G1223"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w while|strong="G3739"\w* absent, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1473"\w* \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* need \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* severe \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G1325"\w* \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G1325"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w building|strong="G3619"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w tearing|strong="G2506"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w down|strong="G2596"\w*.

\w Finally|strong="G3063"\w*, brothers, \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*! Aim \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w perfect|strong="G2675"\w* \w harmony|strong="G5426"\w*, \w encourage|strong="G3870"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w another|strong="G3588"\w*, \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w mind|strong="G5426"\w*, \w live|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* love \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.
Greet \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w another|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* holy \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w*.
\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* saints send \w you|strong="G5210"\w* greetings.
The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with all of you. Amen.
